Title: Provides for the registration of professional nurse anesthetist
Summary: Relates to the certification of registered nurse anesthetists; provides that for such certification an applicant shall file an application, be licensed as a registered professional nurse, have satisfactorily completed educational preparation for the administration of anesthesia by an accredited entity and pay a fee.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to the registration of nurse anesthetists
